title: GOSL Proscribed Father S J Emmanuel – A Catholic Priest linked to LTTE Terrorism
content: LTTE ground force including its leader were defeated in May 2009. LTTE remains banned in 32 countries even 5 years after its defeat. LTTE did not fight with sticks or stones but became a terrorist movement with its own aerial and naval wing with suicide cadres and Eelam bank issuing its own currency/notes, had its…
